title: DinoStudio
description: DinoStudio is a friendly AI-powered image editing companion that makes photo manipulation simple and intuitive. Transform, enhance, and perfect your photos with powerful OpenCV-based tools through a beautiful, user-friendly interface. Features include flip, rotate, crop, filters, blur, sharpen, and instant downloadsâ€”all with a delightful dino assistant theme.

images.alt: DinoStudio landing page with dino mascot

features: Flip & Rotate - Transform images horizontally, vertically, or any angle
Precision Crop - Cut out perfect sections with pixel-perfect controls
Blur Effects - Smooth artistic blur for creative enhancement
Sharpen Tool - Enhance details and clarity
High-Quality Downloads - Save edited images in PNG format
Local Processing - All edits happen in-browser, privacy-first
Responsive Design - Beautiful UI with dino assistant theme
